$hostilesInSector = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsSectorHostile' : sector=$sector refobj=[THIS]
if $hostilesInSector
display info box: text= 'Cannot build a station while hostile ships are in the sector', icon= 66, timeout= 5000, fadeout= 1000
return null
Restrict maximum distance from center to avoid an exploit.
Asteroid checks.
Abort purposes.
